name: Sptrader

scripts.build-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-2 ] ]  static/sptrader.js -o static/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t  [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-2 ] ] static/sptrader.js -o static/bundle.js
